about_the_game:
- Overview

In Green City, you're in the mayor's seat. Your task? To build a city that excels both economically and ecologically.
Balancing resources, laying out infrastructure, and driving economic growth are all part of your role as a virtual city planner.
From deciding on wind energy to managing waste, your choices will dictate your city's future.
This game is your canvas, filled with endless possibilities to create a city that embodies your vision of sustainability.
Whether it's a bustling metropolis fueled by renewable energy or a tranquil town brimming with green spaces, Green City is your platform for eco-friendly innovation.

- An Enjoyable free-to-play Game

Many free-to-play games heavily rely on time-gating as a mechanic, which can sometimes transform the game into a tedious task rather than an enjoyable experience. That's why in Green City, there's no time-gating. Fancy building a bungalow? One click and it's there - no forced waiting periods or any frustrating barriers.
The in-game special currency (eco-coins) is solely for purchasing in-game cosmetics and special structures. These are completely optional and mainly serve to add a unique touch to your city. Enjoy the game your own way, without any annoying hoops to jump through. That's the spirit that animates me in the development of Green City.

- Key Features

  • Resource Management: Navigate the balance between CO2 emissions, economic output, and energy production to create a thriving green city.
  • Sandbox: Unleash your creativity with a flexible sandbox that lets you build your dream green city with few limitations.
  • In-Game Cosmetics: Personalize your city with an array of decorative items. These are completely optional but can add a unique flair to your city.
  • Environmental Education: Enhance your understanding of environmental challenges and learn about the importance of sustainability.
  • Chad: One of NPCs is called Chad. That's not a feature I just wanted to mention it.


Green City aims to deliver a gaming experience that's not only entertaining but also educational. Our goal is to foster an understanding of environmental issues in an enjoyable way, creating a community of informed and eco-conscious gamers.


- A passion project by a solo developer

This game is being developed by a solo indie game developer, Salvatore Fabio, who is creating Green City as a passion project (can't believe I'm talking about myself in third person).

- Community

Don't forget to check out our supportive Discord community, where you can join the conversation about Green City, providing feedback, helping the game's development, exchanging ideas, and inspiring a greener future. Join:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting OpenGL 2.1 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card

name: Green City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting OpenGL 2.1 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card

short_description: Green City is a Free-to-Play, Eco-Focused City-Builder. Create your own beautiful sustainable city, manage resources and balance economic growth with environmental impact.
